alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Victoria and east central Goliad Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 440 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oak Village, or 10 miles southwest of Victoria, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, McFaddin, Fannin, Coleto Creek Park, Saxet Lakes and Oak Village. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 642 and 658. US Highway 77 between mile markers 580 and 598. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
